summary: Completed comprehensive testing of BLVX dual authentication system. Backend APIs 100% functional (33/33 tests passed), but identified critical frontend authentication flow issues. Google OAuth redirects correctly to auth service, but users are redirected back to landing page after successful authentication instead of staying on home page. Same issue affects email login/signup flows.

critical_bugs.issue: Successful authentication (both email and OAuth) redirects users back to landing page instead of home page
critical_bugs.impact: Users cannot access the app after login - this is the reported Google OAuth issue

critical_bugs.issue: Authentication state not maintained during navigation
critical_bugs.impact: Users get logged out when clicking navigation links
critical_bugs.symptoms: Direct /home access works, but navigation from authenticated pages redirects to landing

integration_issues.issue: Post creation interface not accessible due to auth redirect issues
Navigation to /bonita redirects to landing page

passed_tests: Email verification code generation and validation (backend)
All 22 core API endpoints (posts, users, notifications, etc.)
Bonita AI integration - all 3 modes working
Protected route content loading (The Block interface)

success_percentage.frontend: 30% (critical auth flow broken, UI components work)

action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix authentication redirect flow in frontend. After successful login/OAuth/verification, users must be redirected to /home and stay there. Issue is in AuthContext.js or LandingPage.jsx navigation logic. The backend authentication is working perfectly - this is purely a frontend routing/state management issue.
